es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index

Interface FastFeatureIndex<F>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - type of the features
    All Superinterfaces:
    FeatureIndex<F>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastFeatureData<I,F,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFastFeatureData, SimpleFastFeatureData, SimpleFastFeatureIndex

    public interface FastFeatureIndex<F>
extends FeatureIndex<F>
    Fast version of FeatureIndex, where features are internally represented with numerical indices from 0 (inclusive) to the number of indexed features (exclusive).
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
